name: get_facet
description: Fetches an extra compressed facet for a 5-minute window to enrich question generation.

gameId.description: The game identifier used when creating snapshots

facet.description: Which facet to fetch: PTF (Player Threat Focus), PAD (Pressure & Discipline), SPT (Set-Piece Threat), FTT (Field Tilt & Territory), PCS (Possession Chains Summary), KH (Keeper Heat), MMH (Minimal Market Hooks), NCMS (Narrative Capsule + Stats).
